name: Spectrum (itch) (Troy-Martens)
description:
Spectrum is a 2D/3D platformer/bullet hell game where you control two brothers, deities of light and dark. Maintain the balance! All the instructions you need are in the game, leave your high scores so everyone knows how bad-ass you are!

Please fill this out after you play it!

https://goo.gl/ELvnIC
